about.title: {{ProdFullName}} library
about.content: The {{ProdFullName}} {{EnvName}} library provides comprehensive tools for managing watermarks in {{FileFormatUp}} files. This tool is perfect for environments requiring high standards of document presentation, such as legal, educational, and corporate sectors.

examples.comment_3: Clear the document by deleting a watermark

content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** simplifies the process of clearing watermarks from your business documents within {{EnvName}} applications. Integrate our library and follow these steps:
content.step_1: Begin by initializing the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} class with your {{FileformatCap}} document. The API accepts the document either as a stream or a local file path for processing.
content.step_2: Leverage the {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} object to refine the set of watermarks for clearing. You can utilize an image as a search parameter alongside text or formatting attributes. The more specific your search criteria, the more precise the results will be.
content.step_3: Following the search, you'll receive a list of identified watermarks. Proceed by clearing these watermarks from the document.
content.step_4: Once the watermarks are cleared, save the final document using a local file path or a stream object.
